Qieyun: 初開三魚上?, 初開三魚去?
English: sharp; painful. clear; distinct. Name of a feudal state (740-300 B.C.)
words; expression. to resign; to take leave.
to yoke. a chariot. to ride in. used as a polite or respectful term of address.

Qieyun: 並一東入?, 並一冬入?

English: to long for; to dote on.
to think; to remember. to read aloud. twenty.

Qieyun: 見開三魚平?, 昌開三麻平?
